properties.displayName: Potential Data Stealing Via Chromium Headless Debugging
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "--remote-debugging-" and ProcessCommandLine contains "--user-data-dir" and ProcessCommandLine contains "--headless"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects chromium based browsers starting in headless and debugging mode and pointing to a user profile. This could be a sign of data stealing or remote control
